Description: A name of the pair in format AAA/BBB, where AAA is base asset, BBB is quote asset.
Coin denom used for the base asset
Coin used for the quote asset
maker_fee_rate defines the fee percentage makers pay when trading
taker_fee_rate defines the fee percentage takers pay when trading
relayer_fee_share_rate defines the percentage of the transaction fee shared with the relayer in a derivative market
min_price_tick_size defines the minimum tick size that the price required for orders in the market (in chain format)
min_quantity_tick_size defines the minimum tick size of the quantity required for orders in the market (in chain format)
min_notional defines the minimum notional (in quote asset) required for orders in the market (in chain format)
